NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: In this App DealSuperior. You can find the best deal for the product you want to buy, not just the PRICE!
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to find the best deal
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: When you search the product, not just the information from third parties, the recommendation or the best deal from other customers will show for you
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: We also provide that you can use your camera to take a picture of product, and DealSuperior will know what you want
WELCOME_INTRO: Login to enjoy more in this app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
